Sentencas: Reversible solid oxide cells (rSOCs) have significant potential as efficient energy conversion and storage systems.
Titulo: Suppressing Structure Delamination for Enhanced Electrochemical Performance of Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: Nevertheless, the practical application of their conventional air electrodes, such as La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-delta (LSM), Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-delta (BSCF), and PrBa0.8Ca0.2Co2O5+delta (PBCC), remains unsatisfactory due to interface delamination during prolonged electrochemical operation.
Titulo: Suppressing Structure Delamination for Enhanced Electrochemical Performance of Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: Using micro-focusing X-ray absorption spectroscopy (mu -XAS), a decrease (increase) in the co-valence state from the electrode surface to the electrode/electrolyte interface is observed, leading to the above delamination.
Titulo: Suppressing Structure Delamination for Enhanced Electrochemical Performance of Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: Utilizing the one-pot method to incorporate an oxygen-vacancy-enriched CeO2 electrode into these air electrodes, the uniform distribution of the Co valence state is observed, alleviating the structural delamination.
Titulo: Suppressing Structure Delamination for Enhanced Electrochemical Performance of Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: PBCC-CeO2 electrodes exhibited a degradation rate of 0.095 mV h-1 at 650 degrees C during a nearly 500-h test as compared with 0.907 mV
Titulo: Suppressing Structure Delamination for Enhanced Electrochemical Performance of Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: h-1 observed during the 135-h test for PBCC.
Titulo: Suppressing Structure Delamination for Enhanced Electrochemical Performance of Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: Additionally, a remarkable increase in electrolysis current density from 636 to 934 mA cm-2 under 1.3 V and a maximum power density from 912 to 989 mW cm-2 upon incorporating CeO2 into PBCC is also observed.
Titulo: Suppressing Structure Delamination for Enhanced Electrochemical Performance of Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: BSCF-CeO2 and LSM-CeO2 also show enhanced electrochemical performance and prolonged stability as compared to BSCF and LSM.
Titulo: Suppressing Structure Delamination for Enhanced Electrochemical Performance of Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: This work offers a strategy to mitigate the structural delamination of conventional electrodes to boost the performance of rSOCs.
Titulo: Suppressing Structure Delamination for Enhanced Electrochemical Performance of Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: This study presents a universally applicable strategy to inhibit the delamination between the conventional electrode and electrolyte interface.
Titulo: Suppressing Structure Delamination for Enhanced Electrochemical Performance of Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: The incorporation of CeO2 into conventional electrodes is shown to effectively impede valence state fluctuations of metal ions as revealed by micro-focusing X-ray absorption spectroscopy (mu-XAS), thereby preserving structural connectivity and enhancing the long-term stability of solid oxide cells.
Titulo: Suppressing Structure Delamination for Enhanced Electrochemical Performance of Solid Oxide Cells
